Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.animation

Interface IAnimatedBlockSpigot

All Superinterfaces:
IAnimatedBlock
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimatedBlockDisplay
public interface IAnimatedBlockSpigot extends IAnimatedBlock
Represents an IAnimatedBlock with some additional QoL methods for the Spigot platform.
Author:
Pim
